mapper.select: SELECT Reserved2 AS MenuMode, DisplayName AS MenuName FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_menu WHERE Reserved1 LIKE '%Approval%' AND Reserved2 IS NOT NULL

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , D.* , B.Created FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288
AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , D.* , B.Created FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE B.DeputyID = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 288 AND A.ProcessState = 288
AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
) AS ApprovalList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , D.* FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE C.UserCode = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 528 AND A.ProcessState = 288
AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT A.ProcessID , B.WorkItemID , C.PerformerID , A.InitiatorID , A.InitiatorName , A.InitiatorUnitID , A.InitiatorUnitName , C.UserCode , C.UserName , C.SubKind , D.* FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS B ON A.ProcessID = B.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Performer AS C ON B.WorkItemID = C.WorkItemID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS D ON A.ProcessDescriptionID = D.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE B.DeputyID = #{userID} AND C.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016') AND C.State = 1 AND B.State = 528 AND A.ProcessState = 288
AND A.DeleteDate IS NULL
) AS ProcessList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.* , B.EndDate FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE ((A.UserCode = #{userID} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021')) OR (A.DeputyID = #{userID} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T019','T020','T021')))
AND A.Deleted IS NULL
AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_01' AND B.ProcessState = 528 ) AS CompleteList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , A.SubKind AS FormSubKind , C.* , B.EndDate FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_WorkitemArchive AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE ((A.UserCode = #{userID} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T109','T020','T021')) OR (A.DeputyID = #{userID} AND A.SubKind IN ('T000','T004','T005','T006','T008','T009','T011','T016','T017','T018','T109','T020','T021')))
AND A.Deleted IS NULL
AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND A.PIBusinessState = '02_02' AND B.ProcessState = 528 ) AS RejectList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.* , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , B.InitiatedDate , C.FormPrefix , C.FormID , C.FormName , C.FormSubject , C.IsSecureDoc , C.IsFile , C.FileExt , C.IsComment , C.ApproverCode , C.ApproverName , C.ApprovalStep , C.ApproverSIPAddress , C.IsReserved , C.ReservedGubun , C.ReservedTime , C.Priority , C.IsModify , C.Reserved1 , C.Reserved2 FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_CirculationBox AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_FormInstance AS B ON A.FormInstID = B.FormInstID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_CirculationBoxDescription AS C ON A.CirculationBoxDescriptionID = C.CirculationBoxDescriptionID WHERE A.State = 'C'
AND B.DeletedDate IS NULL
AND A.ReceiptType = 'P' AND A.ReceiptID = #{userID} AND A.DataState != 'D' ) AS TCInfoList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , A.SubKind , A.UserCode , A.UserName , B.FormPrefix , C.* , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , B.EndDate FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE A.UserCode = #{deptID} AND A.SubKind = 'A'
AND A.Deleted IS NULL
AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND B.ProcessState = 528 ) AS DeptDraftCompleteList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT B.ProcessID AS ProcessArchiveID , A.PerformerID , A.WorkitemID AS WorkitemArchiveID , B.FormPrefix , C.* , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , A.UserCode , A.UserName , A.SubKind , B.EndDate FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Workitem AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_Process AS B ON B.ProcessID = A.ProcessID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_ProcessDescription AS C ON B.ProcessDescriptionID = C.ProcessDescriptionID WHERE A.UserCode = #{deptID} AND A.SubKind = 'REQCMP'
AND A.Deleted IS NULL
AND A.PIDeleted IS NULL AND B.ProcessState = 528 ) AS DeptReceiveCompleteList

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.CirculationBoxID , A.ProcessID , A.CirculationBoxDescriptionID , A.FormInstID , A.ReceiptID , A.ReceiptType , A.ReceiptName , A.ReceiptDate , A.Kind AS SubKind , A.State , A.ReadDate , A.SenderID , A.SenderName , A.Subject , A.Comment , A.DataState , A.RegID , A.RegDate , A.ModID , A.ModDate , B.InitiatorID , B.InitiatorName , B.InitiatorUnitID , B.InitiatorUnitName , B.InitiatedDate , C.FormID AS FormID , C.FormPrefix , C.FormName , C.FormSubject , C.IsSecureDoc , C.IsFile , C.FileExt , C.IsComment , C.ApproverCode , C.ApproverName , C.ApprovalStep , C.ApproverSIPAddress , C.IsReserved , C.ReservedGubun , C.ReservedTime , C.Priority , C.IsModify , C.Reserved1 , C.Reserved2 FROM COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_CirculationBox AS A INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_FormInstance AS B ON A.FormInstID = B.FormInstID INNER JOIN COVI_APPROVAL4J.JWF_CirculationBoxDescription AS C ON A.CirculationBoxDescriptionID = C.CirculationBoxDescriptionID WHERE A.State = 'C'
AND B.DeletedDate IS NULL
AND A.ReceiptType = 'U' AND A.ReceiptID = #{deptID} AND A.DataState != 'D' ) AS DeptReceiveProcessList
